# Reference

<!-- DO NOT EDIT: This document was generated by Puppet Strings -->

## Table of Contents

### Classes

* [`wazuh`](#wazuh): Blank container class
* [`wazuh::agent`](#wazuh--agent): Puppet class that installs and manages the Wazuh agent
* [`wazuh::audit`](#wazuh--audit): Define an ossec command
* [`wazuh::certificates`](#wazuh--certificates)
* [`wazuh::certificates::mountpoint`](#wazuh--certificates--mountpoint): Creates a puppet file mountpoint for generated certificates
* [`wazuh::dashboard`](#wazuh--dashboard): Setup for Wazuh Dashboard
* [`wazuh::filebeat_oss`](#wazuh--filebeat_oss): Setup for Filebeat_oss
* [`wazuh::indexer`](#wazuh--indexer): Setup for Wazuh Indexer
* [`wazuh::manager`](#wazuh--manager): Main ossec server config
* [`wazuh::params_agent`](#wazuh--params_agent): Wazuh-Agent configuration parameters
* [`wazuh::params_manager`](#wazuh--params_manager): Paramas file
* [`wazuh::repo`](#wazuh--repo): Wazuh repository installation
* [`wazuh::securityadmin`](#wazuh--securityadmin): Wazuh OpenSearch security index init

### Defined types

* [`wazuh::activeresponse`](#wazuh--activeresponse): Define for a specific ossec active-response
* [`wazuh::addlog`](#wazuh--addlog): Define a log-file to add to ossec
* [`wazuh::certificates::certificate`](#wazuh--certificates--certificate): Wraps openssl::certificate::x509 to additionally convert to pkcs8 key (necessary for OpenSearch admin)
* [`wazuh::command`](#wazuh--command): Define an ossec command
* [`wazuh::email_alert`](#wazuh--email_alert): Define an email alert
* [`wazuh::integration`](#wazuh--integration): Define for a specific ossec integration
* [`wazuh::reports`](#wazuh--reports): Define for a Reports section

### <a name="wazuh--certificates--mountpoint"></a>`wazuh::certificates::mountpoint`

on the Puppet server. If you have separate CAs and compilers, you'll
need to implement syncing of some sort (a network share, rsync, etc)
and include this class on all compilers as well as the CA.
Potential improvements:
- Restrict access to the mountpoint with entries in auth.conf

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `wazuh::certificates::mountpoint` class:

* [`filebucket_path`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--filebucket_path)
* [`fileserver_conf`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--fileserver_conf)
* [`manage_fileserver_conf`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--manage_fileserver_conf)
* [`manage_bucket_dir`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--manage_bucket_dir)
* [`bucket_name`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--bucket_name)
* [`owner`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--owner)
* [`group`](#-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--group)

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--filebucket_path"></a>`filebucket_path`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$wazuh::certificates::filebucket_path`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--mountpoint--fileserver_conf"></a>`fileserver_conf`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$wazuh::certificates::fileserver_conf`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--cert_source_basepath"></a>`cert_source_basepath`

Data type: `String`

Prefix for the certificate file source, allowing for legacy and new filebucket workflows.

Default value: `'puppet:///modules/archive'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--generate_certs"></a>`generate_certs`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to generate certificates with the exported resources + Puppet CA workflow in `wazuh::certificates`
They will be generated using the node FQDN as the common name and IP as the alternative name.

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--certs_to_generate"></a>`certs_to_generate`

Data type: `Array[String]`

Array of certificate names to generate when `generate_certs` is true.

Default value: `['dashboard']`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-dashboard'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--dashboard_service"></a>`dashboard_service`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-dashboard'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--dashboard_version"></a>`dashboard_version`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'5.0.0'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--indexer_server_ip"></a>`indexer_server_ip`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'localhost'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--indexer_server_port"></a>`indexer_server_port`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'9200'`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'127.0.0.1'`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-dashboard'`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-dashboard'`

Default value: `'kibanaserver'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--dashboard_wazuh_api_credentials"></a>`dashboard_wazuh_api_credentials`

Data type: `Any`



Default value:

```puppet
[
    {
      'id'       => 'default',
      'url'      => "https://${manager_api_host}",
      'port'     => '55000',
      'user'     => 'wazuh-wui',
      'password' => 'wazuh-wui',
    },
  ]
```

##### <a name="-wazuh--dashboard--certfiles"></a>`certfiles`

Data type: `Variant[Hash, Array]`



Default value:

```puppet
[
    'dashboard.pem',
    'dashboard-key.pem',
    'root-ca.pem',
  ]
```

* [`certfiles`](#-wazuh--indexer--certfiles)
* [`jvm_options_memory`](#-wazuh--indexer--jvm_options_memory)

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_hostname_validation"></a>`indexer_hostname_validation`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether OpenSearch requires the host to match the certificate CN

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--cert_source_basepath"></a>`cert_source_basepath`

Data type: `String`

Prefix for the certificate file source, allowing for legacy and new filebucket workflows.

Default value: `'puppet:///modules/archive'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--generate_certs"></a>`generate_certs`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to generate certificates with the exported resources + Puppet CA workflow in `wazuh::certificates`
They will be generated using the node FQDN as the common name and IP as the alternative name.

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--certs_to_generate"></a>`certs_to_generate`

Data type: `Array[Pattern[/(?:indexer(.*)|admin)/]]`

Array of certificate names to generate when `generate_certs` is true. On a single-node setup, this should be `['indexer', 'admin']`.

Default value: `['indexer', 'admin']`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--admin_cn"></a>`admin_cn`

Data type: `String`

The common name for the admin certificate, defaults to the indexer node name.

Default value: `'admin'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_network_host"></a>`indexer_network_host`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'0.0.0.0'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_cluster_name"></a>`indexer_cluster_name`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-cluster'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_node_name"></a>`indexer_node_name`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `$facts['networking']['fqdn']`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_node_max_local_storage_nodes"></a>`indexer_node_max_local_storage_nodes`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'1'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_service"></a>`indexer_service`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-indexer'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_package"></a>`indexer_package`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-indexer'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_version"></a>`indexer_version`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'5.0.0'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_fileuser"></a>`indexer_fileuser`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-indexer'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_filegroup"></a>`indexer_filegroup`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'wazuh-indexer'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_path_data"></a>`indexer_path_data`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'/var/lib/wazuh-indexer'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_path_logs"></a>`indexer_path_logs`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'/var/log/wazuh-indexer'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_path_certs"></a>`indexer_path_certs`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'/etc/wazuh-indexer/certs'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_security_init_lockfile"></a>`indexer_security_init_lockfile`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'/var/tmp/indexer-security-init.lock'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--full_indexer_reinstall"></a>`full_indexer_reinstall`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_discovery_hosts"></a>`indexer_discovery_hosts`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_initial_cluster_manager_nodes"></a>`indexer_initial_cluster_manager_nodes`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `[$indexer_node_name]`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--indexer_cluster_cn"></a>`indexer_cluster_cn`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `["indexer-${indexer_node_name}"]`

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--certfiles"></a>`certfiles`

Data type: `Variant[Hash, Array]`



Default value:

```puppet
{
    "indexer-${indexer_node_name}.pem" => 'indexer.pem',
    "indexer-${indexer_node_name}-key.pem" => 'indexer-key.pem',
    'root-ca.pem' => 'root-ca.pem',
    'admin.pem' => 'admin.pem',
    'admin-key.pem' => 'admin-key.pem',
  }
```

##### <a name="-wazuh--indexer--jvm_options_memory"></a>`jvm_options_memory`

Data type: `Any`



Default value: `'1g'`

### <a name="wazuh--certificates--certificate"></a>`wazuh::certificates::certificate`

Wraps openssl::certificate::x509 to additionally convert to pkcs8 key (necessary for OpenSearch admin)

#### Parameters

The following parameters are available in the `wazuh::certificates::certificate` defined type:

* [`export_pkcs8`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--export_pkcs8)
* [`pkcs8_extension`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--pkcs8_extension)
* [`algo`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--algo)
* [`ensure`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--ensure)
* [`country`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--country)
* [`organization`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--organization)
* [`unit`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--unit)
* [`state`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--state)
* [`commonname`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--commonname)
* [`locality`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--locality)
* [`altnames`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--altnames)
* [`keyusage`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--keyusage)
* [`extkeyusage`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--extkeyusage)
* [`email`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--email)
* [`days`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--days)
* [`base_dir`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--base_dir)
* [`cnf_dir`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--cnf_dir)
* [`crt_dir`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--crt_dir)
* [`csr_dir`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--csr_dir)
* [`key_dir`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_dir)
* [`cnf`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--cnf)
* [`crt`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--crt)
* [`csr`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--csr)
* [`key`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key)
* [`key_size`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_size)
* [`owner`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--owner)
* [`group`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--group)
* [`key_owner`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_owner)
* [`key_group`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_group)
* [`key_mode`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_mode)
* [`password`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--password)
* [`force`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--force)
* [`encrypted`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--encrypted)
* [`ca`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--ca)
* [`cakey`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--cakey)
* [`cakey_password`](#-wazuh--certificates--certificate--cakey_password)

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--export_pkcs8"></a>`export_pkcs8`

Data type: `Boolean`

Whether to export the private key in PKCS8 format, necessary for OpenSearch admin

Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--pkcs8_extension"></a>`pkcs8_extension`

Data type: `String`

The file extension for the PKCS8 key

Default value: `'pk8'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--algo"></a>`algo`

Data type: `String`

The encryption algorithm to use for the PKCS8 key, for use in Java

Default value: `'PBE-SHA1-3DES'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--ensure"></a>`ensure`

Data type: `Enum['present', 'absent']`



Default value: `present`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--country"></a>`country`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--organization"></a>`organization`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--unit"></a>`unit`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--state"></a>`state`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--commonname"></a>`commonname`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--locality"></a>`locality`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--altnames"></a>`altnames`

Data type: `Array`



Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--keyusage"></a>`keyusage`

Data type: `Array`



Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--extkeyusage"></a>`extkeyusage`

Data type: `Array`



Default value: `[]`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--email"></a>`email`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--days"></a>`days`

Data type: `Integer`



Default value: `365`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--base_dir"></a>`base_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/etc/ssl/certs'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--cnf_dir"></a>`cnf_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$base_dir`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--crt_dir"></a>`crt_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$base_dir`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--csr_dir"></a>`csr_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$base_dir`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_dir"></a>`key_dir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$base_dir`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--cnf"></a>`cnf`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"${cnf_dir}/${name}.cnf"`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--crt"></a>`crt`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"${crt_dir}/${name}.crt"`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--csr"></a>`csr`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"${csr_dir}/${name}.csr"`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key"></a>`key`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `"${key_dir}/${name}.key"`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_size"></a>`key_size`

Data type: `Integer`



Default value: `3072`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--owner"></a>`owner`

Data type: `Variant[String, Integer]`



Default value: `'puppet'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--group"></a>`group`

Data type: `Variant[String, Integer]`



Default value: `'puppet'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_owner"></a>`key_owner`

Data type: `Variant[String, Integer]`



Default value: `$owner`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_group"></a>`key_group`

Data type: `Variant[String, Integer]`



Default value: `$group`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--key_mode"></a>`key_mode`

Data type: `Stdlib::Filemode`



Default value: `'0600'`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--password"></a>`password`

Data type: `Optional[String]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--force"></a>`force`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--encrypted"></a>`encrypted`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `true`

##### <a name="-wazuh--certificates--certificate--ca"></a>`ca`
